name: Conran - The dinky Raccoon
description: Blast your way through waves of enemies. Kill bots, collect their scraps to upgrade your weapons, take advantage of the dynamically changing arena and, eventually, buy yourself free.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7+ Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD4000 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space
